title: Opeth: Complete Discography [320kbps, Includes Lamentations]
description:
OPETH

This discography was ripped from audio CDs I bought myself (because I LOVE this band).

There are only a few tracks that are not ripped from CDs, purely for the fact they are hard to find in CD form. These are:

"Burden [Radio Edit]" *
"Mellotron Heart" *
"Would? [Alice In Chains Cover]" *
"Still Day Beneath The Sun" **
"Patterns In The Ivy II" **
"Soldier Of Fortune [Deep Purple Cover]" ***
"Derelict Herds" ****
"Bridge Of Sighs [Robin Trower Cover]" ****
"Den stÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤ndiga resan [Marie Fredriksson Cover]" ****

*    Burden single, found on TPB.                   ( 256kbps )
**   Blackwater Park bonus disc, found on TPB.      ( VBRkbps )
***  Ghost Reveries bonus track, found on blogspot. ( 192kbps )
**** Watershed bonus DVD tracks, found on TPB.      ( 320kbps )

With that out of the way, the rest of the tracks are ripped directly from audio CDs at 320kbps, including the "Lamentations" live album that was only available as part of a limited edition compilation. Thank you eBay ;D

(Note: Please seed and buy if you like ^_^)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
